snippet: While the president has made mistakes, and can be frustratingly cautious, he has done a better job than his detractors allow.
abstract: Editorial evaluates Pres Obama's overall foreign policy performance, including his accomplishments in Russia, Iran, Asia and the Middle East; argues that while he has made mistakes, and can be frustratingly cautious, he has done a better job than his detractors allow, though it might not be quite good enough.
lead_paragraph: While the president has made mistakes, and can be frustratingly cautious, he has done a better job than his detractors allow.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
